mapper.select: SELECT ar.artist_id, ar.song_id, al.album_id, al.album_image, s.title AS song_title, a.artist_name FROM artist_roles ar JOIN songs s ON ar.song_id = s.song_id JOIN albums al ON s.album_id = al.album_id JOIN artists a ON ar.artist_id = a.artist_id WHERE ar.artist_id = #{artistId} ORDER BY song_title

SELECT DISTINCT a.album_id, a.album_name, a.album_image, a.album_type, a.album_release_date, art.artist_name FROM albums a JOIN songs s ON a.album_id = s.album_id JOIN artist_roles ar ON s.song_id = ar.song_id JOIN artists art ON ar.artist_id = art.artist_id WHERE ar.artist_id = #{artistId} ORDER BY a.album_release_date DESC
